title: Why Stories Outshine Ads: The Brand’s Secret Weapon
body: Pure advertising is like a flashy billboard in a foggy field – it catches a glance, but it’s easy to forget. Storytelling is the fog‑clearing flashlight that shows the path. When brands weave a narrative, they give customers a reason to stay, a character to love, and a plot to share. It turns transactions into memories, and memories into loyal fans. In short, a story sells a lifestyle, not just a product. Invest in storytelling, and watch your brand become the blockbuster everyone wants to binge‑watch.
